feat: Add comprehensive keyboard accessibility and Team Management modal

Keyboard Accessibility:
- Betting Phase: Arrow keys to adjust bet, Enter to place, S/Escape to skip
- Round Summary: Enter key to mark ready for next round
- Lobby: Arrow keys for tab/button navigation, Enter to activate

Team Management (formerly Bot Management):
- Swap positions: Support for human‚Üîhuman, bot‚Üîbot, and cross-swaps
- Kick player: Remove any player (creates empty seat)
- Visual swap mode with clear feedback
- Permission-based actions (creator only)
- Preserved bot difficulty settings

UX Improvements:
- Notification center now floating button (only visible when unread)
- Fixed confetti animation positioning (minimal above player)
- Fixed autoplay timeout with useRef to prevent stale closures
- Fixed loading states in PlayerStatsModal
- Settings debug toggle now opens debug panel modal
- Socket authentication with JWT token
- Bot difficulty badges now properly displayed

Backend:
- Socket.IO authentication middleware
- Added botDifficulty parameter to join_game handler
- Updated validation schemas for bot difficulty
